LiquidRichText.Text: 1. A new hospital for children has been built in our city
2. Another man made satellite has been sent into space
3. More and more trees have been cut down for wood by farmers
4. Thousands of animals have been killed in the forest fire
5. About one hundred building and houses have been destroyed in the earthquake
6. More than fifty films have been shown in Hanoi since June
7. Their hands have been washed and dried on a towel
8. Another book has been read by the studens
9. Some ink has been split on the carpet
10. She has been shown how to do it
